changes.description: Added recheck automatically button for everyone but students
Corrected orphaned row action for assigned work answers and comments
Fixed that sometimes the messages are not sent to telegram
Added notifications
Mentors can now send works back for revision
Materials can now have poll attached
Improved algorithm of transfering works on mentor change
Fixed UI bugs
Fixed that students can't unarchive works
Fixed that students can delete any work
Fixed date range in teachers statistics
Fixed orphans in the database
Telegram notifications
Fixed cant change email error
Can now click on the work in the work list to see the work details
Can manage student courses on user edit page
Added work autosave
Added work comments
Transfer not checked works to the next mentor on mentor change
Added help page
A lot of improvements and bug fixes
Fixed mentor assigned works search
Mentors are now in user list
A lot of improvements and bug fixes
Bugfixes after a huge update
Added settings page
Avatars not only from telegram but also self-uploaded now supported
Introduced a mentor for each subject for a student
Introduced Subjects with relation to Works, Courses and MentorAssignments
Added support for Google Spreadsheet integrations
Added snippets for mentors
Introduced platform route with metadata of the whole platform
Separate route to change password
Started versioning
A lot of improvements and bug fixes
